```{r}
library(tidyverse)
fn <- "../data/hypothetical-correlation.csv"
read_csv(file=fn) %>% 
  data.frame() %>%
  set_names(c("y", "x")) -> simple
```

```{r}
draw_line <- function(a, b, d=simple, pts=simple$y) {
  d$pts <- pts
  d$pred <- a+b*d$x
  d$res <- d$pts-d$pred
  sse <- sum(d$res^2)
  d %>%
    ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
      expand_limits(x=c(0, 20), y=c(-5, 40)) +
      geom_point(aes(x=x, y=pts)) +
      geom_segment(aes(
        x=x, 
        y=pts, 
        xend=x, 
        yend=pred)) +
      geom_segment(aes(
        x=0,
        y=a,
        xend=20,
        yend=a+b*20)) +
      geom_label(aes(
        x=x,
        y=-3,
        label=res))
}
```
